virtual-sensor.name: Thur_pos3_DozerDecagonMux__chart1
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerDecagonMuxMsg) information from Thur deployment

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, GENERATION_TIME, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID, CONDUCTIVITY0, CONDUCTIVITY1, CONDUCTIVITY2, CONDUCTIVITY3, CONDUCTIVITY4 from Thur_Dozer_DecagonMux__conv

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, CONDUCTIVITY0, CONDUCTIVITY1, CONDUCTIVITY2, CONDUCTIVITY3, CONDUCTIVITY4 from wrapper where POSITION = 3 and PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID = 1 and GENERATION_TIME >= (DATEDIFF(second, '1970-01-01', NOW()) * 1000) - 604800000
